title: kalista black spear doesnt work
body: hm i linked up the wrong person, and decided to go into the shop and buy a new one. The one from the shop does not work.

replies.body:
Hey Luuminati,

Were you attempting to rebind after the three minute mark in game? You can only purchase another Black Spear and use it if it's before that point. After that, you're unable to bind to another champion.
I know you're probably not the person to ask about this but... why? What could be wrong with switching past three minutes?

> [{quoted}](name=BetaDude40,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=bfligAl4,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-10-01T00:13:12.781+0000)
>
> I know you're probably not the person to ask about this but... why? What could be wrong with switching past three minutes?

That's so that she cannot simply re-bind to a stronger engager late game if she has someone like a raka support. Otherwise I'd just bind it later on to someone like kennen, galio, etc. in order to have better initiates. Its meant to give her a partner "for life", so that she always has to work with said partner, instead of rebinding to the initiator.

> [{quoted}](name=Zyvux,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=bfligAl4,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-01T00:19:38.610+0000)
>
> That's so that she cannot simply re-bind to a stronger engager late game if she has someone like a raka support. Otherwise I'd just bind it later on to someone like kennen, galio, etc. in order to have better initiates. Its meant to give her a partner "for life", so that she always has to work with said partner, instead of rebinding to the initiator.

Yup, this is pretty accurate. :]
It just sucks if your support goes AFK and you can't rebind.
The result would be that supports would DC to let rebind then would RC

I wish we could refuse the binding in some way. For example, if I am that Soraka support, I usually don't even get a chance to suggest they bind to the jungler or top laner before it happens. From then on our Kalista no longer has an ult, she just has a "save Soraka if she's ganked" button.

@riot kateykhaos

Quick input here; I play kalista alot, and i like her as a champion in strength etc where shes at currently.

Can you make something though please that checks if a team mate is AFK? For instance; Im Kalista adc with a thresh support, mid way through the game the thresh loses internet for the rest of the game, now my passive w damage is gone, and also my ult.

Significantly makes her weaker then other adc's in the event of a D/c.

Do you have any plans to fix this? And if so; What are they?
